description:
A full-service law firm, Johnson & Johnson Attorneys at Law represents people in Decatur, Indiana, in cases involving family law, personal injury, criminal defense, estate planning and litigation. The team at our law firm has a holistic approach when taking on a case. We believe in looking at the big picture to identify the key elements of a client's present circumstances as well as how his or her life may be affected in the future. Our attorneys personally look into each matter and work to build a trusted, lasting relationship with the people we serve.

Our law firm has become a place where people find comfort, support and sound legal advice. We have spent decades steering clients through the legal system. That includes negotiating agreements, drafting documents and taking cases to trial. The people who work with us find that we are:

  • Experienced and knowledgeable
  • Compassionate during difficult moments
  • Aggressive in protecting clients' rights
Facing any type of legal matter can seem overwhelming. Even cases that appear cut and dried are rarely so. Our attorneys dig deeply into each issue to determine the best possible way to help our clients. Johnson & Johnson Attorneys at Law offers free initial consultations. Our law firm takes cases in Jay, Wells and Adams counties.
